about_the_game:
ABOUT

A Last Will and Testament is first person adventure horror game in escape room style with lots of puzzles to solve. Fulfill the last will and find a testament.


FEATURES

  • 100 Steam Achievements hidden in the haunted house! Find it!
  • Story & voice-over
  • Two endings (normal and really, really secret ending)
  • Beatiful and creepy graphic
  • Creepy haunted house ambience and music
  • Puzzles
  • Length of the game: 2-4 hours (5+ hours if you want to see the secret ending, find all collectibles etc.)
  • Good optimization
  • Hot price
  • Save/load game any time
  • Autosave
  • Keyboard and mouse or gamepad controls
  • 29 langauges
  • Options (graphics, disable niose/VHS effect, audio, configure controls, invert y-axis, subtitles, mouse/gamepad sensitivity etc.)
  • Notes
  • Linux, Windows and Mac OS support
  • All resolution supports (21:9, Ultrawide etc.)
  • Steam clouds
  • Steam remote (TV, phone etc.)

Not for the faint-hearted

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM) or legendary GeForce GTX 1060 8GB or RTX 3060 TI
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Yet another normal first-person adventure horror game in an escape room style with nice graphics, inventory, story, voiceover and good price & gameplay. Solve puzzles, collect notes. Fulfill the last will and find a testament.
